question.title: Why after TimeFold upgrade, guiScoreDirector.getIndictmentMap() return null
question.body:
This question is especially for the TimeFold framework. I have the following code in SolutionBusiness class. The SolutionBusiness class is same which is taken from the Nurse Rostering example with the following modification.

public SolutionOutput exportSolution() {
    guiScoreDirector.calculateScore();
    Solution_ solution = guiScoreDirector.getWorkingSolution();
    return exporter.exportSolution(solution, guiScoreDirector.getIndictmentMap());
}

I have upgraded the code from optaplanner to TimeFold, now I am getting a null value on call the method guiScoreDirector.getIndictmentMap(). It was working fine with Optaplanner 8.4.1.Final. The Version of TimeFold is 1.10.0.
